Class FirstTurn

  • java.lang.Object
    • qwirkle.FirstTurn

  • public class FirstTurn
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used when it is a firstTurn This automatically calculates the best move
    Author:
    Niek Tijink & Thomas Kolner
